quadraticCurveTo.!type: fn(x1: number, y1: number, x2: number, y2: number) -> !this

bezierCurveTo.!type: fn(x1: number, y1: number, x2: number, y2: number, x3: number, y3: number) -> !this

arc.!type: fn(cx: number, cy: number, radius: number, startAngle: number, endAngle: number, anticlockwise?: bool) -> !this

ellipse.!type: fn(x: number, y: number, radiusX: number, radiusY: number, rotation: number, startAngle: number, endAngle: number, anticlockwise?: bool) -> !this

rect.!type: fn(x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number) -> !this

circle.!type: fn(cx: number, cy: number, r: number|[number], opt_dir?: number, opt_deg?: number, opt_anticlockwise?: bool) -> !this

line.!type: fn(fromX: number, fromY: number, toX: number, toY: number) -> !this
